result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joshua M Lloyd

defendant.name: Lloyd, Joshua M
defendant.address: W7850 County Road O, Tomahawk, WI 54487

records.addlTxt: Sentencing hearing on November 8, 2022 at 11:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Joshua M Lloyd
Current: W7850 County Road O, Tomahawk, WI 54487 United States  (Effective: 04-07-2022)
Prior: W5810 S. Country Court, Tomahawk, WI 54487 United States

No alcohol, no controlled substances.  Def shall not be on any premises whose primary business is the sale of alcohol unless is there to eat.  Def shall not be within 100 yards of residence at 4 Maple Street and shall have no contact (except for a written apology letter) with Deputy Maas.  Def shall have no contact with M.S. (also lives at residence in complaint.)

10:30 a.m.  Def appears with Atty Johns.  Def in custody.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  Atty Johns indicates def would like to reinstitute sig bond and have rescheduled for 30 days.  Def has medical issues that needs to be addressed.  DA states vics would like speedy disposition.  Court questions def re medical issues.  Def responds.  Court questions Atty Johns.  Brief recess.  10:40 a.m.  BOR.  Per DA, would request a plea today and sentencing to be scheduled.  Atty Johns provides letter to Court from DA.  Court reiterates agreement per letter.  Def understands agreement.  Court is going through rights.  Court goes through rights and plea agr.  Has had sufficient time to talk to atty; satisfied with representation.  Def understands terms of agreement, rights waiving.  Def understands elements State would have to prove.  No coercion.  Def apologizes to family.  Def knowingly, voluntarily, intelligently ready to plead today.  Nothing further from DA.   Count 1, DA moves to amend to City Ord. and dismiss Count 3.  Court amends Count 1 and dismisses Count 3.  Def pleads NC to Ct. 1.  Ct. acc, fg, orders $204.50.  As to Count 2, def pleads NC.  Def agrees.  Brief discussion with Atty Johns.  Def pleads NC.  Doesn't need more time to discuss.  Court acc, fg, JOC TBE.  Sentencing to be scheduled.  Def requesting 30 days.  New address W7850 County Road O, Tomahawk, WI.  Will need to be back for sentencing.  Nov 8 at 11:00 a.m.  Adj.  10:51 a.m.  Bond increased to $2,500 with same conditions.  Greater risk.  Parties to have jail credit prepared at time of sentencing.  Adj.  10:52 a.m.  klr

11:55 a.m.  Court call case, cites appearances.  Def is present with Atty Johns.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears in person for the State of WI.  Warrant was previosuly authorized.  Court quashes warrant.  Court asks why FTA.  Atty Johns addresses  Court.  Atty Johns requests bond continue.  Def not sure of sister's address.  Provides sister's name oc Carmin B.  Mail can go to last address.  (Contact Atty Johns w/address.)  Def respnosible for hearings.  PLEAS.  Def revokes own bond per Court.  PLEAS to be set for 9/14 at 9:00 a.m., per court.  Adj.  12:01 p.m.  klr

9:28 a.m.  Court calls case.  Def FTA.  Atty Johns appears in person.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  DA requests warrant.  Atty Johns has been trying to contact def.  Court authorizes warrant.  Def can quash by posting $500 cash and appearing Monday after arrest.  Adj.  9:29 a.m.  klr
Status conference on August 30, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Status conference on August 15, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Pre-trial conference on June 16, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on May 24, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

11:16 AM Attorney Daniel W Johns in court.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Def is not present.  Atty did not intend to have present.  Per DA discoery is with counsel; if not, will be shortly.  PTC to be set for May 24 at 11:30 a.m.  Adj.  11:18 a.m.  klr
Status conference on May 10, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on April 19, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

No alcohol, no controlled substances.  Def shall not be on any premises whose primary business is the sale of alcohol unless is there to eat.  Def shall not be within 100 yards of residence at 4 Maple Street and shall have no contact (except for a written apology letter) with Deputy Maas.  Def shall have no contact with M.S. (also lives at residence in complaint.)

09:12 AM Defendant Joshua M Lloyd in court with attorney Daniel W Johns.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case.  Per Atty Johns, def waives reading of charges/penalties.  Def pleads NG.  Clerk to enter.  PTC to be set.  4/19 at 1:45 p.m.  DA requests bond to be no contact with M.S.  also resident at home.  Provision now says not to be within the vicinity of home.  Also wants added no tavern provision.  DA requests no contact with M.S.   She is present as is C.M.  Court questions if vics know def.  They live in residence and want to make sure no issues.  No objection from def, per Atty Johns.  No contact with persons who reside at property.  Also other conditions, no presence in bar or restaurant that serves alcohol unless there to eat.  Def can go into places that serve alcohol but only to dine.  Court reisterates conditions.  Other conditions remain in place.  Updates address to W5810 South Country Ct., Tomahawk, WI 54487.  Adj.  9:17 a.m.  klr
Defendant's Discovery Demand

ADDRESS INFO for Joshua M Lloyd
Current: W5810 S. Country Court, Tomahawk, WI 54487 United States  (Effective: 04-07-2022)
Prior: 1010 N Hemlock St, Ironwood, MI 49938
Adjourned initial appearance on April 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.

09:10 AM Defendant Joshua M Lloyd in court.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case.  Bail previously set.  Complaint received.  Def understands charges.  Does not know penalties.  Court questions def re counsel.  Def indicates he filled out paperwork here but waiting for public def.  Bond to continue.  Def requests to know penalties for charges.  Court goes through penalties.  No questions.  Adj.  9:13 a.m.  klr  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.

02/22/22 PC/Bond Hearing:  1:24 p.m.  Def appears in person, in custody.  Atty Hiedi Brewer appears via Zoom audio only.  PC stmt provided to def and atty.   1:25 p.m.  Chief C. Colassacco sworn in.  Direct by DA.  Cross by Atty Brewer.  Court refers to PC statement.  Court questions officer.  Officer excused.  DA/Def identified himself.  Court finds PC.  Court explains process to def.  State requests ond with conditions of no contact with Deputy Mass or area of residence.  $100 Cash bond.  Public def info given and right to Atty explained.  Atty Brewer requests signature bond.  No objection to conditions.  Court sets $500 signature bond.  Def to stay away from Dep. Maas (NC except to write apology letter), no alcohol, no controlled substances.  Def not to be within 100 yards of resident of Deputy Maas.  Initial App to be set for 3/14 at 9:00 a.m.  Adj.  1:37 p.m.  klr
